data.message: All these people telling Mr. Mathers to just do it himself obviously don't understand the sense of community. I am donating as soon as I get paid on Wednesday and I'm not exactly flush with cash. Not to mention I am an Illinoisan, not even from Michigan.

replies.message: show em how it's done bro.  these ppl are ridiculous.

exactly!! thanks for this comment... it's like people do not understand the reason he wants his fans to donate, I find this awesome of Em doing! it just doesn't help the kids but it brings us all together to help the needy at this difficult time and I don't mind doing it too by Friday!
"Brings us all together" There needs to be a lot more this in all aspects of life! Getting kids in school with what they need to succeed is just a great way to start!
i said i understand why he doesnt do it himself its his money and i get that everyone can help. but when im barely getting by as well i cant afford to help other ppl
I don't know what I'm supposed to say. I don't earn. I'm still studying :-(
Ok how can we get it now

It should be common knowledge that teachers spend much of their earnings on supplies for their kids. I've seen it in every teacher I ever had and every teacher I knew outside of the classroom, and teachers already don't make much. If I got to pick where my tax dollars go, it would be into the hands of teachers and infrastructure all the way!
Now that's respect-worthy, I wish everyone was as selfless as you, there would be no greed at all.

I can be greedy too, I'm only human. But I have a heart and kids in school trying to make it tug on my heartstrings. When I was a small boy (3rd or 4th grade) my teacher (same teacher both years) knew I didn't have a lot of money at home so if I didn't get something I needed to she would pull me out of class and give me the supplies I didn't have away from the other kids so they didn't see. I will never forget that and now I have a chance to give back again.
Being human only at social network sites
Where did you see so many comments like that and finish writing a long comment about it in just FIVE minutes?

Dipta Sk Huh?

Edit: I saw the post and then the top 4 out of 5 posts were people saying he should be donating the money. I can type about 85wpm. That about sums it up....

You know a few penny's works a dollar five bucks anything it counts no matter the amount of the donation
I don't see why people think they have to spend their whole paycheck to help out its ridiculous
No you're not
Warnie Pritchett I always donate extra supplies to my kids classrooms each year. They shouldn't have to supply every student.
